email.email: Enter your email in the correct format for example, name@domain.com

contact-address-street.required: Enter your house name or number and street

date-of-birth.future: The date is in the future
date-of-birth.format: Enter your date of birth in the correct format

date-lost.required: Enter the date you realised your BRP was lost or stolen

date-lost.format: Enter the date in the correct format
